content.text:
# Kids' Choice Award for Favorite TV Show

The '''Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Award for Favorite TV Show''' is an award given at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards. From 2015â€“2017, and since 2020, the category has been split into kids and family programs, and in 2019 into comedy and drama.
